mapper.insert:
insert into t_order_supplies (id, companyCode, mailNo, suppliesId, suppliesName, price, suppliesNum, isToZtz, createTime, isDeleted, type) values
(#{order.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.mailno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.suppliesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.suppliesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.suppliesnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.istoztz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{order.isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select * from t_order_supplies where id in(${value})
